name: @primer/generated-data
description: A repo with generated GitHub-like data to be used in tools like Figma plugins and prototypes.

scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir dist && npm run build:data && npm run copy:asstes
scripts.preversion: npm run type-check && npm run test
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist lib
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Github Inc.
